full_description:
GIGABYTE AORUS WATERFORCE 240 All-in-one Liquid CPU Cooler

The GIGABYTE AORUS WATERFORCE 240 Liquid CPU Cooler is a high-performance CPU liquid cooler specially designed for gaming computers. AORUS ARGB lighting design with Intelligent detection can display the CPU temperature through ARGB lighting display, user can easily monitor the system status. It has a 330 degrees manual rotatable design. Free to adjust your preferred orientation. It has a tube diameter of 5.1 mm enlarge to 7.8 mm, raise up 37 % water flow and make heat dissipate quicker and more efficient. Through extensive testing, AORUS has developed the most synergistic 120mm fan blade design to go with the 240mm radiator. It will deliver the most efficient heat dissipation while maintaining the lowest noise levels, even at the maximum speeds. The 120mm dynamic adjusting fan provides the silent operation. The airflow is spilled by the triangle fan edge, and guided smoothly through the 3D stripe curve on the fan surface, effectively enhancing the airflow over the traditional fans. Each AORUS fan provides an ARGB male and female header. Users can connect more AORUS fans synchronize lighting patterns to create cool and uniform lighting systems. It features RGB Fusion 2.0 Software that allows users to control the lighting patterns on the AORUS Falcon logo and fan blades and enables lighting synchronization with peripherals so that users can showcase their own style. The GIGABYTE AORUS WATERFORCE 240 comes with a 1-year warranty.

full_description:
Gigabyte Aorus ATC800 RGB 120mm CPU Cooler

The falcon utilizes its powerful wings to soar through the skies and lock down its prey. The AORUS Core takes inspiration from the falcon's aerodynamic wings, incorporating a multi-layered design that features wing-shaped contours and also resembles the falcon's high-velocity ascension and dives through the skies. With sleek and metallic armor, the AORUS Core symbolizes advancement in technology with its futuristic style. The Gigabyte Aorus ATC800 RGB 120mm CPU Cooler has Cooling Tower Fans Designed For Multi-Core CPUs. Also includes A new fan blade design for maximum fan airflow, providing up to 33% airflow compared to the previous generation. The Unique CPU Temperature Indicator allows users to monitor CPU Temperatures and adjust fan speeds to lower temperatures. The fan speed control function also indicates fan operation status. Smart detected CPU temperature is displayed through the lighting. The color will change according to CPU loading and temperatures. Lighting indicator bars increase/decrease as RPM increases/decreases. Gigabyte Aorus ATC800 CPU Cooler comes with All-new RGB LED Design. RGB Fusion 2.0 Software allows users to control the lighting patterns on the AORUS Falcon logo and fan blades and enables lighting synchronization with peripherals so that users can showcase their own style.

full_description:
GIGABYTE AORUS WATERFORCE 360 All-in-one Liquid CPU Cooler

The GIGABYTE AORUS WATERFORCE 360 All-in-one Liquid CPU Cooler is designed to efficiently dissipate heat from high-end CPUs, featuring an ARGB lighting display for a visually stunning experience. The pump also boasts an adjustable screen orientation that can be rotated 330 degrees, allowing for greater installation flexibility. Additionally, the pump is equipped with high-performance, low-noise level Graphene Nano Lubricant ARGB fans for optimal cooling performance. The pump also supports RGB FUSION 2.0 synchronization with other AORUS devices for seamless integration. With universal design support for fan and pump RPM control, the AORUS high-performance pump is compatible with all motherboard brands.

AORUS ARGB lighting Display

The GIGABYTE AORUS WATERFORCE series is a top-of-the-line CPU liquid cooling solution designed specifically for gaming PCs. With its AORUS ARGB lighting design and intelligent temperature detection, users can easily monitor their system's status through the colorful ARGB lighting display. It's an excellent choice for those who want to improve the performance and aesthetics of their gaming rig.

Enhanced Cooling Performance

With its large radiator and powerful fans, the AORUS WATERFORCE 360 offers enhanced cooling performance for your CPU. The 360mm radiator provides a large surface area for heat dissipation, while the three 120mm fans ensure optimal airflow. This combination of features allows the cooler to effectively dissipate heat from your CPU, keeping it running at optimal temperatures.

Synchronize More AORUS Fans Lighting

The GIGABYTE AORUS WATERFORCE 360 All-in-one Liquid CPU Cooler has both ARGB male and female headers, allowing for simple lighting pattern synchronization when connecting multiple fans. This results in a unified and visually attractive lighting system for your construction. Furthermore, the fans provide excellent cooling performance, allowing your system to operate cool and quietly. Improve your gaming experience by upgrading your PC with AORUS fans.

RGB Fusion 2.0

The GIGABYTE AORUS WATERFORCE 360 All-in-one Liquid CPU Cooler has All-new RGB LED Design. RGB Fusion 2.0 Software allows users to control the lighting patterns on the AORUS Falcon logo and fan blades and enables lighting synchronization with peripherals so that users can showcase their style.
